value.latex:
Soient ${f,g} : {\R^2} \to \R$ de classe $\mathcal{C}^n$. Calculer
$\frac{\partial^n(fg)}{\partial x^k\partial y^{n-k}}$ en fonction des dérivées
de $f$ et $g$.
value.html: Soient \({f,g} : {\R^2} \to \R\) de classe \(\mathcal{C}^n\). Calculer \(\frac{\partial^n(fg)}{\partial x^k\partial y^{n-k}}\) en fonction des dérivées de \(f\) et \(g\).

value.latex:
$\frac{\partial^n(fg)}{\partial x^k\partial y^{n-k}} =
\sum_{i=0}^k\sum_{j=0}^{n-k} C_k^iC_{n-k}^j
\frac{\partial^{i+j}f}{\partial x^i\partial y^j}
\frac{\partial^{n-i-j}g}{\partial x^{k-i}\partial y^{n-k-j}}$.
value.html: \(\frac{\partial^n(fg)}{\partial x^k\partial y^{n-k}} = \sum_{i=0}^k\sum_{j=0}^{n-k} C_k^iC_{n-k}^j \frac{\partial^{i+j}f}{\partial x^i\partial y^j} \frac{\partial^{n-i-j}g}{\partial x^{k-i}\partial y^{n-k-j}}\).

preview: Soient \({f,g} : {\R^2} \to \R\) de classe \(\mathcal{C}^n\). Calculer
